item.title: Adding a pause to you Powershell scripts
item.description: If you have taken a look at some of the scripts I have posted earlier you might have noticed a rather strange line, usually at the end of the script: This was actually just to get the script to wait for the user to press a key. It is equivalent to the good ol’ pause in batch scripting. The reason I used this method was that I just didn’t know how to do this in Powershell (yes, I am ashamed).
